document_data.caption: A map showing Little Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Little Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Little Street''' was, as the name implied, a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Little Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. It ran north to south, originating on the [[Street of the Manticore]] where it branched due south to end on [[Shattercrock Alley]].
